function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inefficient source control measures leading to infectious spread in high-risk places","Impact":"Increased risk of workers contracting pandemic diseases","Mitigation":"Implement efficient source control measures and surveillance systems to monitor and enforce protocol adherence","Technologies":"IoT architectures, surveillance systems","People":"Workers in high-risk places","Owner":"Employers and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Overcrowding and lack of PPE doffing control in office environments","Impact":"Increased risk of infectious spread and workers contracting diseases","Mitigation":"Implement administrative actions to control office overcrowding, enforce PPE doffing, and maintain social distancing protocols","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, IoT architectures","People":"Office workers, visitors","Owner":"Employers and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Ineffective air cleaning, filtration, and ventilation systems","Impact":"Increased risk of virus entry pathways and unhealthy workplace environment","Mitigation":"Implement effective air cleaning, filtration, and ventilation systems to block virus entry pathways and maintain healthy workplace environment","Technologies":"Air cleaning systems, filtration systems, ventilation systems","People":"Office workers","Owner":"Building maintenance and facilities management"}]}
